title: A superporous and pH-sensitive hydrogel from Salvia hispanica (chia) seeds: stimuli responsiveness, on–off switching, and pharmaceutical applications

The chia seeds hydrogel (CSH) is a superporous, superabsorbent, haemocompatible, and smart biomaterial exhibiting stimuli-responsive swelling–deswelling behavior and sustained drug release.
